channel.title: Slayer Help
channel.description:
So i am coding a 317 PI from scratch and i am trying to put in a slayer system. I got all the dialogues correct and the Player-save correct but when i click " yes i would like a task" it doesn't give me a task where do i implement this in to the server?
Thanks so much.
EDIT: NVM GOT IT FULLY WORKING

item.description:

Did u added all dialogues in actionhandler.java?
